ms_title: Oxford Jesus College MS. 111 (The Red Book of Hergest)

contents.text: A note in YCM states that a leaf is missing here. According to Gifford Charles Edwards's collation of the manuscript, however, there is no leaf missing; rather, the catchword at the bottom of 114v does not correspond to the first word of 115r.
